反.definition: contrary; in reverse; inside out or upside down; to reverse; to return; to oppose; opposite; against; anti-; to rebel; to use analogy; instead; abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system

反串.definition: (Chinese opera) to play a role outside of one's specialty; (modern) to play a transvestite role; to masquerade as an opponent

反倒.definition: (coll.) but on the contrary; but instead

反光鏡.definition: reflector (typically concave, as in a torch); mirror (typically plane or convex)

反其道而行之.pinyin: fǎn qí dào ér xíng zhī
反其道而行之.definition: to do the very opposite; to act in a diametrically opposite way

反分裂法.definition: anti-secession law of 2005 (whereby PRC claims the right to invade Taiwan)

反切.definition: traditional system expressing the phonetic value of a Chinese character using two other characters, the first for the initial consonant, the second for the rhyme and tone

反制.definition: to take countermeasures against; to hit back; to counter

反剪.definition: with hands behind one's back; trussed

反口.definition: to correct oneself; to renege; to break one's word

反右.definition: anti-rightist; abbr. for 反右派鬥爭|反右派斗争[Fan3 you4 pai4 Dou4 zheng1]

反右派鬥爭.definition: Anti-Rightist Movement, Mao's purge of "rightists" after the Hundred Flowers Campaign ended in 1957

反右運動.definition: Anti-Rightist Movement, Mao's purge of "rightists" after the Hundred Flowers Campaign ended in 1957

反哺.definition: to support one's parents in their old age; to show filial piety; to to repay; to return a favor

反唇相譏.definition: (idiom) to answer back sarcastically; to retort

反問.definition: to ask (a question) in reply; to answer a question with a question; rhetorical question

反問語氣.definition: tone of one's voice when asking a rhetorical question

反嘴.definition: to answer back; to contradict; to renege; to go back on one's word

反嘴鷸.definition: (bird species of China) pied avocet (Recurvirostra avosetta)

反噬.definition: to backfire on; to rebound on

反圍剿.definition: communist attack against the Guomindang's encircle and annihilate campaign

反坐.definition: to sentence the accuser (and free the falsely accused defendant)

反坫.definition: earthern goblet stand also known as 垿[xu4] (old)

反壟斷.definition: to break up or prevent monopolies; anti-monopoly; antitrust

反客為主.definition: lit. the guest acts as host (idiom); fig. to turn from passive to active behavior

反射.definition: to reflect; reflection (from a mirror etc); reflex (i.e. automatic reaction of organism)

反射光.definition: to reflect light; reflection; reflected light

反對.definition: to oppose; to be against; to object to

反導導彈.definition: anti-missile missile (such as the Patriot Missile)

反式.definition: trans- (isomer) (chemistry); see also 順式|顺式[shun4 shi4]

反式脂肪酸.definition: see 反式脂肪[fan3 shi4 zhi1 fang2]

反彈.definition: to bounce; to bounce back; to boomerang; to ricochet; rebound (of stock market etc); bounce; backlash; negative repercussions

反復.definition: variant of 反覆|反复[fan3 fu4]

反思.definition: to think back over sth; to review; to revisit; to rethink; reflection; reassessment

反悔.definition: to renege; to go back (on a deal); to back out (of a promise)

反感.definition: to be disgusted with; to dislike; bad reaction; antipathy

反應.definition: to react; to respond; reaction; response; reply; chemical reaction; CL:個|个[ge4]

反手.definition: to turn a hand over; to put one's hand behind one's back; fig. easily done

反掌.definition: lit. to turn over one's palm; fig. everything is going very well.

反接.definition: trussed; with hands tied behind the back

反撲.definition: to counterattack; to come back after a defeat; to retrieve lost ground

反擊.definition: to strike back; to beat back; to counterattack

反敗為勝.definition: to turn defeat into victory (idiom); to turn the tide

反文旁.definition: (colloquial) grapheme 攵 (variant form of Kangxi radical 66, 攴)

反方.definition: the side opposed to the proposition (in a formal debate)

反映.definition: to mirror; to reflect; mirror image; reflection; (fig.) to report; to make known; to render

反映論.definition: theory of reflection (in dialectic materialism), i.e. every perception reflects physical reality

反杜林論.definition: Anti-Dühring, book by Friedrich Engels 恩格斯[En1 ge2 si1]

反正.definition: anyway; in any case; to come over from the enemy's side

反正一樣.definition: whether it's right or wrong doesn't make a lot of difference; six of one and half a dozen of the other; as broad as it is long

反殺.definition: to respond to an assault by killing one's assailant

反求諸己.definition: to seek the cause in oneself rather than sb else

反污.definition: to accuse the victim (while being the guilty party)

反清.definition: anti-Qing; refers to the revolutionary movements in late 19th and early 20th century leading up to 1911 Xinhai Revolution 辛亥革命[Xin1 hai4 Ge2 ming4]

反滲透.definition: anti-infiltration (measures taken against subversive external forces); (chemistry) reverse osmosis

反滲透法.definition: (Tw) Anti-infiltration Act (2020), which regulates the influence of entities deemed foreign hostile forces

反特.definition: to thwart enemy espionage; to engage in counterespionage

反璞歸真.definition: variant of 返璞歸真|返璞归真[fan3 pu2 gui1 zhen1]

反用換流器.definition: inverter, device that converts AC electricity to DC and vice versa

反白.definition: reverse type (white on black); reversed-out (graphics); highlighting (of selected text on a computer screen)

反目.definition: to quarrel; to fall out with sb

反目成仇.definition: (idiom) to fall out with sb; to become enemies

反相.definition: (a person's) rebellious appearance; signs of an impending rebellion; (physics) reversed phase

反省.definition: to reflect upon oneself; to examine one's conscience; to question oneself; to search one's soul

反美是工作赴美是生活.pinyin: fǎn měi shì gōng zuò fù měi shì shēng huó
反美是工作赴美是生活.definition: being anti-American is the job, but life is in America (jocular comment made about public figures who are brazenly xenophobic but whose family live abroad)

反義字.definition: character with opposite meaning; antonym; opposite characters

反聖嬰.definition: La Niña (counterpart of El Niño in meteorology)

反腐倡廉.definition: to fight corruption and advocate probity

反腐敗.definition: to oppose corruption; anti-graft (measures, policy etc)

反臉無情.definition: to turn one's face against sb and show no mercy (idiom); to turn against a friend

反芻.definition: to ruminate; to chew the cud

反衝.definition: recoil (of a gun); to bounce back; backlash

反袁.definition: opposing Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4kai3] in National Protection War 護國戰爭|护国战争[Hu4guo2 Zhan4zheng1] 1915-1916

反袁運動.definition: anti-Yuan movement, opposing Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4 kai3] in National Protection War 護國戰爭|护国战争[Hu4 guo2 Zhan4 zheng1] 1915-1916; same as 反袁鬥爭|反袁斗争[fan3 Yuan2 dou4 zheng1]

反袁鬥爭.definition: war of 1915 against Yuan Shikai and for the Republic

反裘負芻.definition: lit. to wear one's coat inside out and carry firewood on one's back (idiom); fig. to live a life of poverty and hard work; fig. to act stupidly

反覆.definition: repeatedly; over and over; to upend; unstable; to come and go; (of an illness) to return

反觀.definition: by contrast; but as for this...; viewed from another angle; subjectively; introspection

反詰.definition: to ask (a question) in reply; to answer a question with a question; rhetorical question

反走私.definition: to oppose smuggling; anti-contraband (measures, policy etc)

反超.definition: to reverse (the score); to pull off a comeback; to take the lead

反轉.definition: reversal; inversion; to reverse; to invert (upside down, inside out, back to front, white to black etc)

反過來.definition: conversely; in reverse order; in an opposite direction

反酷刑折磨公約.pinyin: fǎn kù xíng zhé mó gōng yuē
反酷刑折磨公約.definition: UN convention against torture and cruel treatment (ratified by PRC in 1988)

反鎖.definition: locked in (with the door locked from the outside)

反間.definition: to feed the enemy misinformation through their own spies; to sow discord in the enemy camp

反間計.definition: stratagem of sowing dissension; CL:條|条[tiao2]

反電子.definition: positron; also called 正電子|正电子[zheng4 dian4 zi3]

反面.definition: reverse side; backside; the other side (of a problem etc); negative; bad

反面人物.definition: negative character; bad guy (in a story)

反面兒.definition: erhua variant of 反面[fan3 mian4]

反面教員.definition: (PRC) teacher by negative example; sb from whom one can learn what not to do

反面教材.definition: negative example; sth that teaches one what not to do

反革命宣傳煽動罪.pinyin: fǎn gé mìng xuān chuán shān dòng zuì
反革命宣傳煽動罪.definition: the crime of instigating counterrevolutionary propaganda

反顧.definition: to glance back; (fig.) to regret; to have second thoughts about sth

反骨.definition: (physiognomy) protruding bone at the back of the head, regarded as a sign of a renegade nature
